checkpoints.title: HTML
checkpoints.description: I have had experiences in coding with basic and semantic HTML for better SEO and clear, concise code

checkpoints.title: CSS
checkpoints.description: I am efficient in working with CSS attributes, CSS selectors and CSS rules. I am also comfortable with making keyframes animations and do media queries for responsive design.

checkpoints.title: JAVASCRIPT
checkpoints.description: I started learning Javascript by reading the entirety of Javascript - The Definitive Guide by David Flanagan. I am also familiar with manipulating DOM elements using pure Javascript

checkpoints.title: TAILWIND
checkpoints.description: I have had experiences working with Tailwind CSS and has grapsed its many utility classes. I have also worked with configuring the base style of Tailwind to fit the brand identity and provide custom classes for faster work flow

checkpoints.title: REACT
checkpoints.description: React was the first Frontend library I learnt, and so I am very familiar with its core functionalities. I have worked with React hooks and custom hooks multiple times and am also efficient in using React as a frontend to communicate with a backend server

checkpoints.title: SQL DATABASE
checkpoints.description: I started working with SQL database through Microsoft Access first to graps its architecture. From then I have had experiences working with SQL database through SQLite and the Flask framework and SQL database through the ORM from Django and other frameworks.

checkpoints.title: Django Framework
checkpoints.description: I have built projects with Django and Django REST framework as a backend service. I have also worked with Django's ORM and Django admin view to create admin control panels for better control of the website.
